api

Interface NavigableRootedNeighborGraph<S>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The vertex type on which the graph structure is defined.
    All Superinterfaces:
    NeighborGraph<S>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IndexedColorGraph<S,C>, IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraph<S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BreadthFirstNeighborGraphBuilder, IndexedColorGraphBase, IndexedColorGraphBuilder, IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase

    public interface NavigableRootedNeighborGraph<S>
extends NeighborGraph<S>
    Extension of the NeighborGraph<S> API for rooted connected neighbor graphs in which one can query, for each vertex of the graph, the neighbors which are either closer, further, or of the same distance to the root vertex. Note that it only makes sense to use this interface for graphs which are undirected (a is a neighbor of b if and only if b is a neighbor of a) and connected. With the navigability features of this interface, one can find all shortest paths to the root vertex from any given vertex by recursively calling the method getNeighborsInPreviousShell until the root vertex is reached.
    Author:
    pdokos

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<S> getNeighborsInNextShell(S s)
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the neighbors of s which are one unit farther from the root than s, if the graph contains s.
      java.util.Collection<S> getNeighborsInPreviousShell(S s)
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the neighbors of s which have distance from the root one unit less than that of s, if the graph contains s.
      java.util.Collection<S> getNeighborsInSameShell(S s)
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the neighbors of s which are of the same distance from the root as s, if the graph contains s.
      S getRoot()
      Returns the designated root vertex of the graph.

      • Methods inherited from interface api.NeighborGraph

        containsVertex, getNeighborsOf, getNumberOfEdges, getNumberOfVertices, getVertices, hasEdgeJoining
